metaDescription: Find top-rated financial advisors in Prescott. Expert guidance for retirement planning, wealth management, and investment strategies.

advisors.name: Edward Jones - Financial Advisor: Daniel Machado

heroDescription: Prescott, Arizona, is a picturesque city known for its rich history and outdoor recreational opportunities.
landscapeDescription: With a population of 40,590, Prescott's economy is driven by tourism, healthcare, and retail. The city benefits from a growing population and a vibrant community.
uniqueNeeds: Prescott requires tailored financial advice due to its unique economic landscape and demographic trends.
citySpecificRiskAdvice: Prescott's economy relies on tourism and healthcare, posing risks during downturns. Real estate prices are rising, indicating potential bubble risks. Prepare for wildfires and droughts.

sections.title: Economic Growth
sections.description: According to BEA (2023), Prescott's economy has shown steady growth, driven by tourism and healthcare services.

sections.title: Wealth Demographics
sections.description: According to Census (2023), the median income in Prescott is $58,000, reflecting a diverse economic base.

sections.title: Advisor Specializations
sections.description: Based on BLS (2023), financial advisors in Prescott are increasingly focusing on retirement planning and investment strategies.

sections.title: Cost of Living
sections.description: According to BLS (2024), Prescott's cost of living is slightly above the national average, driven by housing and healthcare costs.

sections.title: Real Estate Market
sections.description: According to Zillow (2024), Prescott's real estate market is competitive, with home prices rising steadily due to demand.

sections.title: Business Environment
sections.description: According to Fortune (2024), Prescott's business climate is favorable, with support for small businesses and local entrepreneurship.
